title: Learn how to pronounce
description: Learn to pronounce letters and phrases
intro: Welcome! Here you can tap the letters and phrases to hear how they sound. Learning a new language is like a game, and you can start now!
write_placeholder: Write here the text you want to hear...
click_to_hear_letter: Click to hear the letter pronunciation
click_to_hear_word: Click to hear the word pronunciation
enter: Enter the text to hear how it's pronounced...
